patthana16.91:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ pariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho napariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana16.91:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ apariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naapariyāpanno
patthana16.91:2.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ apariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana16.91:2.1_2: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naapariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ
patthana16.91:2.1_3: apariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naapariyāpanno ca naanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.91:2.1_4: naapariyāpanno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā
